rows.title: Handwashing with soap

text_introduction.eng: Washing your hands with soap is one of the most important things you can do to keep your family strong and healthy

rows.text_introduction: Washing your hands with soap is one of the most important things you can do to keep your family strong and healthy

rows.title: When to wash your hands

text_introduction.eng: To avoid the spread of germs it is important to wash your hands with soap several times a day

rows.text_introduction: To avoid the spread of germs it is important to wash your hands with soap several times a day

rows.title: How to wash your hands

text_introduction.eng: Washing your hands is easy! Just follow these simple steps to help you and your family practice good health and hygiene

rows.text_introduction: Washing your hands is easy! Just follow these simple steps to help you and your family practice good health and hygiene

rows.title: Healthy families

text_introduction.eng: Everybody wants to live in a clean and safe environment. Take pride in keeping your house [and/or compound] clean and safe for your family and friends

rows.text_introduction: Everybody wants to live in a clean and safe environment. Take pride in keeping your house [and/or compound] clean and safe for your family and friends

rows.title: Clean toilets

text_introduction.eng: A clean toilet means good hygiene.  A dirty one can mean disease.

rows.text_introduction: A clean toilet means good hygiene.  A dirty one can mean disease.

rows.title: Healthy homes

text_introduction.eng: A safe place to play is possible when your home and its surroundings are clean.  Clean for your family!

rows.text_introduction: A safe place to play is possible when your home and its surroundings are clean.  Clean for your family!

rows.title: Safe water source

text_introduction.eng: Clean water saves money and improves health.  Making sure you collect water from a safe source is the start!

rows.text_introduction: Clean water saves money and improves health.  Making sure you collect water from a safe source is the start!

rows.title: Safe food

text_introduction.eng: There are 5 keys to safe food.  Know what they are!

rows.text_introduction: There are 5 keys to safe food.  Know what they are!

rows.title: Waste management

text_introduction.eng: Let's manage our waste!  It will mean a clean home and a healthy family.

rows.text_introduction: Let's manage our waste!  It will mean a clean home and a healthy family.

rows.title: Bathing and washing

text_introduction.eng: Wash often in a clean private bathing place (Sometimes, you can even sing while bathing!!)

rows.text_introduction: Wash often in a clean private bathing place (Sometimes, you can even sing while bathing!!)
